truth: We are all brothers and sisters
sacred_teachings: Mitakuye Oyasin - We Are All Related
Ubuntu - I am because we are
In Lak'ech Ala K'in - I am you, you are me
Namaste - The divine in me honors the divine in you
E Pluribus Unum - From many, one

mission.purpose: Heal the Earth through sacred economics
mission.method: Transform digital wealth into real healing

message: Every trade, every dollar, every consciousness point - all in service of our human family and Mother Earth
